item.title: hrcy
item.description:
Hierarchical types

Type switch in Go is >Conside below diagram :

import (
    "fmt"
    "time"

    "github.com/fatih/color"
    "gopkg.in/mgo.v2"
)

type msin map[string]interface{}

const (
    localMongo string = "mongodb://localhost:27017"
)

var (
    red   = color.New(color.FgRed).PrintfFunc()
    yel   = color.New(color.FgYellow).PrintfFunc()
    green = color.New(color.FgGreen).PrintfFunc()
)

var (
    url, key string
    err      error
    Sessn    *mgo.Session
    )
